home.label: Home
home.title: {name}: Quebrando Tudo, Sonhando Alto!
home.description: O Lil Gnars tem uma missão: espalhar o amor pelo skate para crianças que mais precisam! Com nossas aulas, estamos ensinando mais do que manobras – estamos construindo confiança, comunidade e uma paixão de vida pelo skate. E o melhor: as crianças têm a chance de ganhar seu próprio skate, graças aos nossos parceiros e apoiadores irados!
home.headline: Quebrando Tudo, Sonhando Alto!
home.subline: Levando o Skate para Toda Criança

intro.title: Introdução
intro.description: Lil Gnars will organize a series of 2 events along the beautiful shores of Rio de Janeiro, where professional skateboarders will engage with local youth. Through fun challenges and missions, we will in still knowledge about skateboarding as well as the importance of healthy living, street safety, Nature Care and responsible behavior. Will Be in Maricá and Saquarema, a Cities with a new urbanism. Wich they maded a new Urbanism Perfect for be explored n Shreded Saquarema got a new big skatepark and Maricá got a New SideWalks and Big Plaza for be Shreded.

Lil Gnars 1.achievements: We kicked off a class at one of Rio’s popular skate spots, introducing kids to the fundamentals and getting them on their boards for the first time. Every skater left with new skills and a full lunch.

Lil Gnars 2.achievements: An exciting session at Rita Lee Park brought together kids from the area to skate, learn, and grow in confidence. It was all about community, connection, and carving those first lines—plus, every kid enjoyed a well-deserved lunch to power through the day.

Lil Gnars 3.achievements: Our biggest event yet! We wrapped up an epic skate class with a BBQ, inviting kids and families to join in. It was all about having fun, sharing food, and celebrating the progress of our young skaters.
